wikipedia_page.main: Lt. Albert Luvian Wade (20 September 1884 – 28 April 1917) was a Scottish rugby union player. He was killed in World War I.

link_mentions.page: List of international rugby union players killed in World War I
response: * Albert Luvian Wade, died on 28 April 1917, Aged 32.
